scenario.name: unrelible_answer
scenario.send:
SIP/2.0 180 Ringing [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number][local_port] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=unrelible_answer 10000 10000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=unrelible_answer c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

SIP/2.0 183 Session Progress [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number][local_port] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=unrelible_answer 10000 10000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=unrelible_answer c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number][local_port] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:[$number]@[local_ip]:[local_port];user=phone> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=unrelible_answer 10000 10000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=unrelible_answer c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
